name: curl-status
readme:
get url http status

#### Install `npm install -g curl-status` #### Usage ```shell usage: curl-status [options] url ``` #### Example ```shell $ curl-status https://www.npmjs.com 200 $ curl-status https://google.com/not-existing 404 $ curl-status https://not-existing ``` [Examples/](https://github.com/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli/tree/master/Examples) Sources: * [scripts/curl-status](https://github.com/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli/blob/master/bin/curl-status) Feedback [![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli.svg)](https://github.com/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli/issues) [![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli](https://badges.gitter.im/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli.svg)](https://gitter.im/russianidiot/curl-status.sh.cli) [![GitHub followers](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/russianidiot.svg?style=social&label=Follow)](https://github.com/russianidiot) * * *
